author: Morgan Chalfant and Brett Samuels
title: Trump defends demonstrators protesting social distancing restrictions
description: President Trump on Friday defended protesters defying federal social distancing guidelines to express displeasure with state stay-at-home orders meant to slow the spread of the coronavirus.
